Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (mostly flaked off); possible traces of single added white band; exterior: on handle zone, double guilloche frieze above key maeander band, running left, between bands and dilute lines; below, lotus and bud frieze.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 49, note 103; p. 235, no. 138)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0184) (phase 2)
